channel.title: tinymce on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in tinymce on SpiderSoft

item.title: iBrowser and TinyMCE
item.description: You can find plenty of tutorials how to setup tinyMCE and iBrowser, but non of them mention about common problems, like “error building image list!”, or how to bind regular image browser to iBrowser. Here you can find full instructions.
